thread.title: Debra & Larry LaGrave
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Debra & Larry LaGrave

author: Debra & Larry LaGrave
title: Debra & Larry LaGrave
text:
We were with another insurance company for over 30 years and we were
looking to reduce our insurance cost. After providing Julie our existing policy information she was able to reduce our overall cost substantially.
We greatly appreciated that Julie did not pressure us into a new policy until we were ready to make that decision.
Moving forward we are confident that Ms. Evans will be able to answer any or all questions regarding our new insurance policies.
She is an asset to your company!
